message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $150 is a bit high for me.  How about $110?  I'm really interested in this product, but I have a budget to stick to.
I understand you have a budget to stick to, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a fair price considering the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. $130 is still a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go up to $120.  This is the absolute most I can spend.
